name: GDG Ghardaia Kick-off

venue.name: GS School
venue.address_1: Rue Ibn Rostom, Entrée de marché de Ghardaia

description:
It gladdens us to announce the first event of GDG Ghardaia this friday: GDG Ghardaia Kick-off !
We will talk about the GDG Program, GDG Ghardaia story, upcoming events, tech talks. You will also get a chance to meet awesome people in tech.

name: DevFest Algeria Center 2017
description:
GDG DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

 Technical topics will be selected based on the needs of Developer community. Moreover, DevFest 2017 is aim to enhance relevant soft skills for Developers to advance their career.

• GDG DevFest Algeria Center 2017 is open for all IT communities, developers, experts, geeks, or students, who want to participate in this dev festival with us!

This edition will be kind of special So stay tuned 

#DevFest17 #Algeria #GDGAlgiers #GDGTipaza #GDGLesRosiers #GDGGhardaia #GDGChlef #GOOGLE #GDG

name: Web Study Jams
description:
Au programme
Many people learn better when they learn in groups.
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.
The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.
Apply here for free! : https://goo.gl/5eZX4

À prendre avec vous
Laptop+charger with Chrome and a text editor installed

Important

name: Technology in Business
description:
Au programme
* An introduction to online businesses: Google Adsense, Google AdWard, Google analytics, Affiliate
* Block chain tech and cryptos : How does it work ?

À prendre avec vous

Important

name: TensorFlow viewing party and machine learning study jam
description:
Au programme
- We will watch together videos from the Tensorflow summit and discuss what's new about it? and how can we benifit from the updates?
- Walk together thgrough a tensorflow codelab
- AI Project showcase

Please bring
Laptop + charger

name: IO18 Extended
description:
IO18 Extended is the event in which we will talk about Google latest updates that were announced in this year's IO at Shoeriline Amphitheater, Mountain view. Google has big announcement for both Developers and standard users, you will learn about these products in the event talks and workshops.
Apply!come! and let's have fun.

name: Flutter Study Jam
description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

name: Flutter Study Jam Session 2
description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

name: Assistant- Build actions for your community
description:
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.
You will learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for the community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or for hometown. This way, you can build something in an area that you care about or you are interested in.
Laptops and chargers are required

name: Web traning session01- Laravel PHP
description:
If you are looking to get your hands on the worlds most popular PHP framework, then this is the tight workshop for you.

We will cover everything from installing Laravel to building a basic application. Everyone will learn along as we go from a freshly installed Laravel application up to creating a basic web app that interacts with a database.

name: Flutter Study Jam 3- Oran Bootcamp
description:
Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.
This bootcamp will train attendees for a full day about the trending mobile development framework: Flutter in 24 hours bootcamp

name: DevFest Ghardaia 2018
description:
GDG DevFest 2018 is the biggest Google annual all-day developer conference in Algerian Sahara, featuring sessions across multiple product areas and hands-on code labs!

# AGENDA :

08:00 AM Registrations & Welcome Coffee
09:00 AM Keynote
10:00 AM Talk: What's new Android?
10:45 AM Talk: Giving life to your Startup ideas
11:30 AM Talk: What's new in Flutter?
12:15 PM Coffee Break / Q&A and Networking session
01:00 PM Prayer time

01:30 PM Hands-on Code Labs

Lab 01: Building robots with Raspberry Pi and Python
Lab 02: Introduction to Flutter - Building Android apps
Lab 03: Real world Wep apps with React&Firebase

03:00PM Closing & Happy Hour

# EVENT VIDEOS
https://goo.gl/u1ys6Z

name: Flutter Study Jam- Session 4
description:
Yo Yo! we have the best Plan for your 2019 start.
Get your hands on developing and building beautiful Mobile apps for both IOS and Android in Flutter study Jam
a full day training brought to you by GDG Ghardaia and @delta Science
On Thursday January.3rd at Centre Dr.Merghoub, Beni Isguen
Application are open until Wednesday at 15h.
https://goo.gl/forms/HXCoq007g5Ibyf372

name: She is a Leader (for Girls only)
description:
*_For Girls Only_*

She is A leader is a joint-event organized by TADFI English club & Women Tech-Makers Ghardaia in partnership with Nouzhal El Albab Club.
The event will be presented in a form of a session of coaching delivered by 5 young female coaches.
These sessions aim for the personal and professional development of our young women.
It is a chance for our young participants to share their ideas and learn new ones by asking and sharing.

**Agenda**

- Women Startups
- Freelancing
- Motivation to get first step in her own business
- Futures (smart house/kitchen)
- Tech for kids ?
- Safety and security
- AR (augmented reality) / AI (artificial intelligence) Wearables / gadgets
